TopicTitle: FanWork Friday: Another day at the office!

Articles.Content: <figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="1080" data-orig-width="1920"><img src="http://41.media.tumblr.com/399a1e8f447e34ab0f7f9a34e0c0e6af/tumblr_inline_nvka9yidE11rr2wit_540.png" data-orig-height="1080" data-orig-width="1920"/></figure><p>BaconBad has a good idea of what a typical day at the office looks like for a Kerbal: running away from exploding rockets. Thankfully, this example is not representative of real space agencies! #KSP<br/><br/></p>
Not running away, but using the force from the blast for that last dV needed to reach the target.
How... what... hmm... That's very well done. Yet I can't figure out what any of the elements or materials are. How was this made?
I think it was Drawn ! In photoshop !
